title: iFacialMocap Plugin
description: This plugin receives data from an application called "iFacialMocap" that allows you to capture motion on your iPhone/iPad or WindowsPC with NVidia RTX GPU.
longDescription:
This plugin receives data from an application called "iFacialMocap" that allows you to capture motion on your iPhone / iPad or WindowsPC with NVidia RTX series GPUs.


The official website of iFacialMocap is as follows.

https://www.ifacialmocap.com/


The UnrealEngine tutorial is on the following page

https://www.ifacialmocap.com/tutorial/unreanengine/

https://youtu.be/0ID7f02AlE0


The iOS application for iFacialMocap is available at

https://apps.apple.com/tt/app/facemotion3d/id1507538005


The iFacialMocap iOS app sends more than 52 facial expression morph data.

It also sends bone rotation and bone translation.


[About Desktop Applications]

iFacialMocap's UnrealPlugin receives data in real time from the iFacialMocap desktop application.

The desktop application is available via a link on the iFacialMocap website.


The iFacialMocap desktop application is available in free and paid versions.


- The free version of the desktop application receives data from the iFacialMocap iOS application and passes it to 3D software such as UnrealEngine.


-The paid version of the desktop app likewise has the ability to receive data from the iFacialMocap iOS app and pass it on to software such as UnrealEngine. In addition, if the user has an NVIDIA RTX series GPU, the webcam alone can be used to perform high-quality face tracking. Paid applications are available from the Microsoft Store.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Receive high-performance motion capture data
  •  Creating an Animated Blueprint Upload

Code modules: (please include a complete list of each plugin module and its module type (landing, editor, etc.))

  • Module name: iFacialMocap, Module type: Runtime
  • Module name: iFacialMocapEditor, Module type: UncookedOnly

Number of blueprints: 1

Number of C++ classes: 5

Replicated Networks: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64bit

Supported Issues Build Platform: Windows 64bit

Documentation: https://www.ifacialmocap.com/tutorial/unreanengine/

Sample images: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1blSbKoUGmpZGa2Tc8ab5iR_j-nxgUfNW/view?usp=share_link

Important/Additional Information:


iFacialMocap's UnrealPlugin receives data in real time from the iFacialMocap desktop application.

The desktop application is available via a link on the iFacialMocap website.


The iFacialMocap desktop application is available in free and paid versions.


- The free version of the desktop application receives data from the iFacialMocap iOS application and passes it to 3D software such as UnrealEngine.


-The paid version of the desktop app likewise has the ability to receive data from the iFacialMocap iOS app and pass it on to software such as UnrealEngine. In addition, if the user has an NVIDIA RTX series GPU, the webcam alone can be used to perform high-quality face tracking.
